tier.item: Maryam in love-EZ Omid be. PRES
The DP view of the noun phrase offers the further option of placing the possessor NP in the [Spec, DP]
position. This is the analysis adopted by Ghomeshi (1997).
In fact Sadler (2000) adopts the DP analyses: the possessor NP (DP) is in [Spec, NP] position, and D° takes
the whole NP as its complement.
When morphology does better than Syntax P. Samvelian

position. This is the analysis adopted by Ghomeshi (1997).

the whole NP as its complement.
When morphology does better than Syntax P. Samvelian
